headline: Bath & Body Works appoints former Nike executive Daniel Heaf as CEO
summary: He replaces Gina Boswell, who has been at the helm of the beauty and skincare firm since November 2022.  In March, the company said Boswell would be temporarily absent, for several weeks, for surgery.
